Name: Liondance Companion
AttributesDescription: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 120, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: Snacks Lingyang made for the Liondance audience. The treats were a perfect combination of fatty and lean meats, complemented by fruits and vegetables to balance out the heaviness. Ideal for enjoying while watching the performance.
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases ATK of all Resonators in the team by 120, lasting for 15m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
